SourceString: <b>{ConversionMod_UI}|round()%</> Damage converted to <me_PierceDam>Pierce Damage</>.\nOn hit <b>{Chance_UI}|round()%</> chance to deal <b>{MinDmg}|floor()</> to <b>{MaxDmg}|floor()</> <me_PierceDam>Pierce Damage</> in a <b>{Radius_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)m</> radius with a <b>{AilmentChance_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)%</> <me_AilmentChance>Ailment Chance</>.\n<b>+{MPCostMod}|round()</> Energy Cost.

<b>{ConversionMod_UI}|round()%</> Damage converted to <me_PierceDam>Pierce Damage</>.\nOn hit <b>{Chance_UI}|round()%</> chance to deal <b>{MinDmg}|floor()</> to <b>{MaxDmg}|floor()</> <me_PierceDam>Pierce Damage</> in a <b>{Radius_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)m</> radius with a <b>{AilmentChance_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)%</> <me_AilmentChance>Ailment Chance</>.
Apply <b>{Doom}|floor()</> <me_Doom>Doom</> to enemies in a <b>{Radius_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)m</> radius.
Consumes <me_Doom>Doom</> on target to deal <b>{DmgMod_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)%</> more Damage to it per stack consumed.
Deals up to <b>{DmgMod_UI}|round()%</> more Damage based on distance. Maximum Damage at <b>{Distance_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)m</>.

Enemies hit take <b>{VitDot}|round()</> <me_VitalityDam>Vitality Damage</> every second and have <b>{ResRedMod_UI}|round()%</> <me_VitalityDam>Vitality</> <me_Resistance>Resistance</> for <b>{Duration}|round()s</>.

Grants <b>{ActionSpdMod_UI}|round()%</> increased Attack and Cast Speed.\nWhen directly used, gain an additional <b>{MSMod_UI}|round()%</> increased Movement Speed that decays over <b>{Duration}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)s</>.

While active grants:\r\n<b>{CritChanceMod_UI}|round()%</> increased <me_Critical>Critical Hit</> Chance\r\n<b>+{CritDmgMod_UI}|round()%</> <me_Critical>Critical Hit</> <me_CritDamMult>Damage Multiplier</>

<me_ColdDam>Cold</> Explosion has a <b>{FreezeChance_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)%</> chance to <me_Freeze>Freeze</> for <b>{FreezeDuration}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)s</>
